QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( select d.patid, d.staffid, d.issuedate, CASE WHEN d.duration > 365 THEN 365 WHEN d.duration < 0 THEN 1 WHEN d.duration IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE d.duration END AS duration, q.description, d.quantity, dc.dmdid, cast(left(cast(d.patid as varchar), 7) || cast(d.probobsid as varchar) as bigint) as visitDetailId, d.prodcodeid from {sc}.drug d join {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND d.patid = ch.PERSON_ID left join {sc}.lookup_emisproductdictionary dc on d.prodcodeid = dc.prodcodeid left join {sc}.lookup_quantunit q on d.quantunitid = q.quantunitid where d.issuedate is not null )
select *, case when duration = 0 then issuedate else issuedate + (duration-1) * INTERVAL '1 day' end as end_date from a order by patid
